description_part1: ... the friendly and adventurous ginger cat with a heart as fiery as his fur! Freddy is always on the move, exploring new places and turning every corner into his personal playground.
description_checkin: Check Freddy in. You have met Freddy and are okay with giving the coordinates to me and the rest of the world – Only GPS coordinates and the name will be stored.
checkin_error: Well, you could make one up – I guess?
checkin_points_description: All Freddy's check-ins. The places he has ventured.
